messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Re: gross
messages.msgSnippet: While I can see educational value in this, YUCK!  I could
messages.messageBody:
<<. And, if nothing else, scrape the kitchen counter and look at bacteria
under a microscrope.>>>>

While I can see educational value in this, YUCK! I could never let my house
be in that state, But I do know a couple of other people that do, and they
don't even have kids.

Bec,
Camano Island Homeschoolers,
Washington Unschoolers,
http://groups.yahoo.com/group/Washingtonunschoolers/
